stressResilience.title: Stress Resilience

digitalWellness.title: Digital Wellness
digitalWellness.description: Assesses digital habits and work-life balance in the digital age.

faithValues.title: Faith & Values
faithValues.description: Explores alignment between personal values and faith in professional context.

about.title: About AuthenCore Analytics

landing.heroSubtitle: Professional psychometric assessments for career development, team building, and organizational growth
landing.heroDescription: Discover strengths, identify development opportunities, and make data-driven decisions with our comprehensive suite of scientifically-validated assessments.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Trusted by organizations worldwide for accurate, actionable insights
landing.feature1Description: Our assessments are backed by rigorous research and proven methodologies
landing.feature2Description: Get clear, practical recommendations for personal and professional development
landing.feature3Description: Understand team dynamics and optimize collaboration across your organization

landing.feature5Description: Available in multiple languages for global organizations
landing.feature6Description: Enterprise-grade security with complete data privacy protection

landing.assessmentCareerDesc: Discover your ideal career path with comprehensive interest and skills analysis
landing.assessmentEIDesc: Evaluate and develop your emotional intelligence across five key dimensions
landing.assessmentCommunicationDesc: Understand your communication preferences and improve team interactions
landing.assessmentCulturalDesc: Assess your ability to work effectively across diverse cultural contexts
landing.assessmentLeadershipDesc: Develop your leadership potential with insights into your leadership style
landing.testimonial1: Authencore Analytics transformed how we understand and develop our team. The insights are invaluable.
landing.testimonial2: The assessment results helped me identify my strengths and create a focused development plan.
landing.testimonial3: We've seen significant improvement in team collaboration since implementing these assessments.
